author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Warhammer 40,000 has spent the last several years running off a card-system for their Missions in Matched Play. The Leviathan Deck and Pariah Nexus deck left me a bit cold as they didn't really cater to any type of gaming outside the 'Standard 2000pt game'. 

Will they try something new? Let's check it out!

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the Cards to review. 

#AdWIP

#Warhammer40000

#WarhammerCommunity

title: GMG Reviews - Warhammer 40,000: 2025-26 Mission Deck by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
There are no Wolves on Fenris! The Sons of Russ are back with new models, a new codex and two new Detachments to check out. Let's dive in!

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the Book to review.

title: GMG Reviews - Space Wolves by  Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The Ultramarines take on the Adeptus Mechanicus in this Battle Report using the new Mission Deck using Challenger Cards and the new Incursion Card Set!

title: Let's play with the new 40k Matched Play Mission Deck for 2025-26!

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The Crusade books have offered Warhammer 40000 players a way to play narrative campaigns since the launch of Leviathan in 2024. Let's see what's new in 2025!

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the Book to review.
